amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for the dismissal without prejudice of an ethics complaint 180 calendar days after a complaint is filed and the committee is deadlocked.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that an ethics complaint be dismissed after 180 days if the committee hearing the complaint is deadlocked and a motion to organize an investigative subcommittee does not prevail.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tauzin amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 236, 1 Present (Roll no. 410).
